description: Erection of hip to gableroof extension with rear dormer and installation of 3nos front rooflights and rendered to finish to match with existing dwelling.
decision_conditions: Officers  volume calculations of the proposed hip to gable roof extension and the rear dormer demonstrate the proposal  would exceed the permitted development rights volume parameters  and therefore would be contrary to Condition B.1 (d) ( cubic content of resulting roof space would exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more than - (i) 40 cubic metres in the case of a terrace house, or (ii) 50 cubic metres in any other case), Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed render walls of the proposed dormer would not be  of a similar material as the main roof the dwelling and therefore would not  comply  with the parameters of  with Condition B.2 (a) ( similar materials to existing) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
